level.text: The evaluation board established pursuant to ยง2621 shall perform the following functions under the general direction of the contracting officer:
Review the current data files on eligible firms and responses to notice of the particular project;
Evaluate the firms in accordance with the prescribed criteria in ยง2620;

Hold discussions with at least three (3) of the most highly qualified firms about concepts and the relative utility of alternative methods of furnishing the required services (but not concerning architect-engineer fees) when the prospective architect-engineer contract is estimated to exceed ten thousand dollars ($10,000); and

Prepare a selection report for the contracting officer recommending, in order of preference, at least three (3) firms that are evaluated to be the most highly qualified to perform the required services.

The selection report shall include a description of the discussions and evaluation conducted by the board to allow the contracting officer to review the considerations upon which the recommendations are based.
